website_summaries.verdict: One of the most premium and advanced headsets available for better gaming results.
pros: Aluminum construction makes these headsets more durable than most plastic options
Built-in microphone features a flip-up mute for quick silence and volume control
cons: Pickup volume in the microphone is lower than other high-quality gaming headsets

customer_reviews.title: Sad state of affairs
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this headset. He hasn't been outside in 4 1/2 months and when i threw the football to him, he took it to the face - didnt know to put his hands up. Sad state of affairs... but very nice headset.
customer_reviews.author: MBooth

customer_reviews.title: What?
customer_reviews.text: I thiught the A10 was suppose to be the best one for 60 bucks but i keep having to replug in the jack over and over again , i lose connection to the controller within like 45 mins...Idk..whats going on...
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN TURTLE BEACH!
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing quality. Good price amazing sound. I would totally recommend this to anyone to anyone who wants a fantastic headset. Totally beats turtle beach!
customer_reviews.author: David Homan

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: After using a Turtle Beach wireless I decided to go with these when the battery on the Turtle Beach was low. This headset is plugged in to the controller so it works continuously as long as the batteries in the controller are good. Even with the controls turned up as high as possible the sound is low. I tried tweeking with the settings in the Xbox but it is not loud enough to play and hear the footsteps of other players (PUBG). I would recommend a Turtle Beach as a back up as well.
customer_reviews.author: ccatt1

customer_reviews.title: Mic doesn't work. Full of struggles.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah hi, I’m a gamer, and I needed a replacement headset. Was recommended Astros instead of Turtle beach, so I got them. First it was a sound issues, had to use reddit to solve that, then it was party chat issues, also used reddit for that. Then it’s the stupid mic issue, it doesn’t work. I’ve tried everything from using other controllers to disconnecting everything and doing hard resets and still nothing. Nothing online has helped me. I dropped over $60 on this and I got trash. MIGHT I ADD MY PACKAGE WASNT EVEN CLOSED ALL THE WAY
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie White

customer_reviews.title: Hurts the top of your head.
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. The sound quality was everything I expected for the price range and the mic provided good voice quality. The problem is with the pad at the top center that rests on your head. It’s too small and really aggravates the top of your head. I found myself adjusting the headset every few minutes. When plugging it directly into an Xbox controller there is a lot of cable left over and is kind of annoying. I haven’t worn it in a week and the top of my head hurts just thinking about it. Ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Best Sound Quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: Astro's are usually extremely expensive, this model is well worth it's lower base model price. The sound quality is superior and gaming is amplified heavily. I came from wearing turtle beaches for years, one thing I will say is comfort however is the reason I could not give this headset a 5th star, after wearing for awhile the head band on top lacks cushion and with the ear pieces being heavy, the band will push down on your head and kinda hurt after awhile. Other than that this headset is extremely durable and mic is still working for me over a year later. Have recommended to many people as the go to buy.
customer_reviews.author: John Mazzagatti

customer_reviews.title: Massive JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Junk!!!! 2 months stopped working don’t get the square trade either it product has a 1 year warranty so they don’t cover until after the 1 year.. amazon has 1000s of complaints and returns on this crap DONT BUY
customer_reviews.author: gato408

customer_reviews.title: Received defective
customer_reviews.text: My headset came looking nice and perfect, but once I realized how to plug them in and got it to send out noise, I realized two things. 1. The left side didn't work. 2. The headset only played volumes (out of the right ear) at low volumes. Even turning up the volume control didn't make it loud. I wasted over $60 on these and I'm returning them. I don't know if it's a manufacturer defect or if it was damaged during the delivery (since the deliverers like to throw the items over my fence instead of walking to the door and knocking).
customer_reviews.author: Onatah

customer_reviews.title: Great head set!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son since Astro is to me the top maker of gaming headsets. We've had turtle beach and tritton but within a month or two they broke not even from miss use but they just stopped working. Thos ASTRO head set is the A10 the entrance level but WOW ot's made much better then the other head sets. You can feel it when you pick it up and wear it. My Son is 13 and loves it. ASTRO goes up to the A50 for professional play but right now well put the A10 through six months of testing!!! I already placed my order for mine!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Best in class for budget friendly gaming headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Best headset I have bought so far. Very loud and clear for not being powered by an amp. It has a very extra long cord that is very good quality. The headset is very comfortable, i have a huge head and dont feel like my head is being pressed. Also ear cups are very soft. I dont feel fatigued after wearing for long gaming sessions. I have used it with my phone to watch movies and the sound quality is fantastic as well. It actually sounded like surround sound. Very durable. I have abused these headphones and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My 1st one had an issue that sound would only work in one ear right out of the box. The replacement is amazing. It's a bit bassy in some games, but for the money they are much better than my beaches. I use this headset daily, many days 8 to 10 hrs per day. They are very cumfy on ears. The sound quality is incredible. Can hear sounds in games I couldn't hear with my other headset. Friends tell me the mic is crystal clear, and I sound completely different than with old headset.
customer_reviews.author: Cat H.

customer_reviews.title: After the 1st one didn't work the replacement 1 came in and it had the same defect
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kid for Christmas. It didn't work. Can't hear out of it. Amazon replaced it in just a few days. That one did not work. Been told from people at the store it's a good product just bad stock. We tried it on more then one thing to see if it would work. Just one ear works and its muffled.
customer_reviews.author: Bever DeLloyd

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is not good
customer_reviews.text: The headset does not work, it’s advertised as a plug in and play headset, but I plugged it in eager to see how it was and it just did not work. I plugged in the cord correctly and the sound was WAY off and the microphone was not working. I looked at a forum for Astro a10 headsets and this seems to be a very common problem on both Xbox and PS4 leading me to believe that Astro has very poor quality control. My disappointment is immeasurable and my day is ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Headset for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Astro a40s and the mixamp for a decade now and they've never let me down. I bought this as a quick headset for my upstairs xbox and it works great. The reason for 4 stars is that 1. I like my headset to breath a bit more and allow noise in if I want it, this headset makes it hard to hear anything around you and 2. I do get discomfort on around my ears after a couple hours of continued use.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Cruser

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, look for better options.
customer_reviews.text: As excited as I was to finally be able to have a nice headset to play with I was EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED when they arrived. The jack for the headphone cable had a metal plate on the inside shift less than a centimeter and now the headset is completely worthless. PLEASE if you are looking for affordable gaming headphones DO NOT buy these. Choose a better brand. I honestly though this was a good brand but now I am completely disappointed and will never be purchasing a product from these guys again. Unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: C-mon black

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable and not as good audio quality as others
customer_reviews.text: The head phones are just ok. The cable that plugs into the controller also detaches on the headset and caused some issues with hearing in one of the ears if it isn’t plugged into the headset a certain way. The headset feels a little heavy and bulky to wear. The audio quality is just ok. I returned these and went with the HyperX CloudX and they are much more comfortable, better build quality and better audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISSATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: I had heard a lot about the high quality gaming headsets called " Astro ". So, I decided to YouTube reviews and which headset would be good for my budget range. I decided and went with these. They started out good and within a couple months the movable microphone stopped working. It's very disappointing because I would believe that these would last more than 5 months. Especially since they are a higher grade brand.... Honestly, I wouldn't buy these again and it was just a waste of my Amazon cedit.
customer_reviews.author: Ira L.

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable, in fact painful to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing about this headset is impressive to me. The sound quality and volume aren't anything special, the materials aren't comfortable, and the "padding" on the top of the head just end up being painful to wear. I wouldn't recommend this headset and would definitely buy a different one if I had the option to return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Better than Turtle Beach!
customer_reviews.text: I love these because of the replaceable cord they come with. I used to use turtle beach but the wire would eventually wear out making the headset useless. No complaints with these at all. Comfortable and does not hurt at all for extended periods of time. Sound quality is great and so is mic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Van Werden

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Decent Audio, Perfect Mic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a $100 turtlebeach headset before settling on this one and the mic was so sensitive it picked up on things i couldnt even hear from downstairs. Bought this headset and everyone on the other end can only hear me (clearly) even with another tv playing on the background. Have had absolutely no issue, its comfortable and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Alex D

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I use these a lot when playing Gears of War and Battlefront, they really help to amplify the stereo score of the games as they progress, the bass is very clear and the noise cancellation works like a charm. They are rather bulky, but so long as you don't look in the mirror you won't really notice.The mic is flip to mute and I haven't had any problems with it. The cord is extremely long though, and I found myself getting tangled and pulling it out of the controller when I got excited. All in all they work great and for the price the quality can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler L Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: **Update** I have now for a couple weeks been using this headset for my product demos I host at home because of covid. I am very pleased with the quality and use of these! I was surprised at the quality of the sound and how much it blocks outside sounds from detracting you. The headset is kinda heavy resting on my head, so I can only wear them for a few hours at a time. But seeing as I am not a huge gamer (I only game to play with my family across the country). I do really enjoy the headset! Great price for the quality of what you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Oh my lord
customer_reviews.text: I've been a regular purchaser of the $30 Amazon/off brand headsets because I'm trying to find quality stuff for cheap. This is the budget friendly and super high quality headset to get. Im an avid player of FPS and I am honestly hearing things I've never heard before in game and even in menus. It was almost shocking. Pros: Lightweight Great speakers Cord is just the right length Comfortable Cons: A little snug in the head* *I am a member of the Big Head Community and I also wear glasses. I know all of these stack against me, but I'm sure with a little stretching of the headset, it'll be great.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Stink of head sweat and full of dundruff
customer_reviews.text: Received headphones on time they where suppose to be in used/very good condition but upon inspection and smelling them they stink of someone else wearing them. Disgusting i will not even be letting my son put these on his head. Just nasty. Update upon further inspection headphones where full of dandruff in the ear piece creases
customer_reviews.author: Alien Ent.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I can hear clearly, people can hear me clearly (though I do get complaints that it suddenly goes very low, sometimes, when I haven’t touched the volume), and it’s decently comfortable to use. The only problem that I run into it that it says it mutes when you push the microphone up; it mutes sometimes, but other times it does not and creates a bit of an issue when you don’t want others to hear you.
customer_reviews.author: GreenKitten

customer_reviews.title: Choose another pair
customer_reviews.text: Extremely quiet for a gaming headset. I habe to go into settings and turn all my volumes up very high just to hear voice chat and game sounds in these. They also have a crappy plug / wire. They constantly drop sound and I have to play around with the plug to get the sound back
customer_reviews.author: Mac Wyman 1

customer_reviews.title: You May Not Be able to Use party Chat...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item because it was referred to me and I though it would be a great purchase. Instead I was frustrated and dumbfounded when I was not able to talk to other players in party chat and that was the reason I purchased them. I returned them and got some turtle beaches from Walmart, if it worked would have been a great product. I liked the feel and comfort but functionally wasn't there. Also so many threads with this same problem and no solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: Very worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love them, I use them everyday. I've had them for months and they definitely fit the description. Very comfortable, I can wear them for 15 hours straight without ear discomfort (not an exaggeration on the hours) only problem is that they don't keep sound in as well as other headphones might, and noise outside of them sounds even louder sometimes. But I still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Defective “Refurbished”
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the used, “refurbished” one. No sound or audio came out of the right speaker. Tried a few things to troubleshoot it but in the end, it was defective. Can’t necessarily rate how good the product is since they sent a defective one, but I ended up going with a Turtle Beach Stealth 600 which are incredible for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Eric R

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in December-  Broke by May
customer_reviews.text: The quality is just so so, but you get what you pay for. Connecting wire from headset to X-Box is already loose and one speaker completely cuts out unless you hold the wire a certain way. The sad part is that there is not even 20 hrs of gaming on them as I have been on the road working. Have had too long to return, so all i can do is write a review and tell folks.... buyer beware..
customer_reviews.author: William T

customer_reviews.title: Great product can't go wrong anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and mic quality are definitely one of the best for the price it probably competes with some high range headsets. I thought they would feel cheap but not at all! They are well built and very very durable and not to mention very comfortable!! Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Luis S.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy if you need new gaming headphones
customer_reviews.text: Well for the price, I don't think you could beat these! They are better than my Turtle Beaches that I paid over 100$. They sound great, good bass and able to hear footsteps in FPS very well. From now on until otherwise I'll buy Astro when it comes to gaming headsets. The only bad thing that I can come up with is they aren't as comfortable as higher priced headsets but the sound quality matches. So not the best looking, comfortable but the positives reallly outweigh the negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are okay for the price. I use them for Xbox one COD 4, they feel heavy to me. the Mic does not work during the game. Hard to hear the footsteps of other players, not as clear and crisp as I would expect from Astro. I wouldn't recommend for multiplayer gaming especially for long playing time.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this used, it came like new except for the cord. I had to replace the connecting cord because it was not functioning properly. Costed another $10, but still worth the price I paid overall, just a bit of a hassel.
customer_reviews.author: Frank W

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: There's apparently a wireless version. Just get those. I had to buy the wireless for my husband a year after I bought these ones. On a side note, at least he liked them enough to get them twice.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Bre

customer_reviews.title: Big Head? Still Fits.
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty big head and it fits me fine. The audio quality is great, much better than my previous Turtle Beach headset and at half the price. The cable from the controller to the headset is pretty long, but it's not too annoying. Overall I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Crow

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Sup boys, where we dropping? I bought this because I raged too hard on Fortnite dying to a pleb and broke my other set. These are real high quality, I would totally recommend. Only thing that I would say they could improve on is adding a mute button, and maybe cutting down in the weight. They aren’t super heavy, but when you’re putting in some serious hours in the sticks, you start to feel them a little, but they have a nice foam pad on top so it’s tolerable. 9/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee McGee

customer_reviews.title: Love but they hurt my head!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I use them to play on my Xbox and the sound is great. I have also never had a problem with the mic. The only issue is that the headset really hurts the top of my head after 30 minutes or so. I catch myself adjusting them a lot solely for that reason alone but other than that these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Guiselman

customer_reviews.title: No cord included AND didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this used but in 'very good condition' for my son's birthday. When he opened the box it was very worn, had NO cable which it needs to connect to the controller, and after we located a cable we had from another headset, it didn't even work! The instruction booklet they sent had print too tiny for anyone to actually read. We then tested it with a second cable, and that didn't work either. Now I have to return it and my son has no bday gift. The description said NOTHING about not having a cable. Epic FAIL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was spotty then died all together
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice out of the box but couldn’t get it to work. My son and his friends and then my tech husband all tried and it never worked except for a few seconds here and there . Threw away packaging so probably can’t return. A lot of money lost and big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: JBean16

customer_reviews.title: My Girlfriend Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Great headset. If I turn it all the way up it cancels out the girlfriend screaming at me from the couch. She's not a fan for obvious reasons, but also can't deny it's very well made and effective. Also, this headset hurts if thrown at you with vigor from aforemetioned girlfriend. 10/10 will probably buy again after she breaks it one of these days.
customer_reviews.author: Sercle_of_Life

customer_reviews.title: Made To Last!👍
customer_reviews.text: This headset is by far the most durable and amazing headset I’ve ever had in my whole life I’ve spent $60 on top of $60 on top of $60 for a headset every single year by numerous different companies and none of them have lasted that long but this headset right here is so great I’ve had it for two years now I’ve had not even a single issue a lot of people might think this is expensive but I think it’s worth The price of the quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: King NOOB 9000

customer_reviews.title: Still works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased almost a year ago. Still work great. Purchased many foreign made brands and all have failed. Granted these are probably foreign made but the difference is these still work. Sounds good. For the money probably the best value out there.
customer_reviews.author: RJK

customer_reviews.title: Great budget headset
customer_reviews.text: For the price compared to the other high end Astro's, this is a great buy. I'm not a fan of wireless and neither are these. The only complaint is they get uncomfortable after a few hours but overall the build quality, and sound is on par with Astro's other headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid Burgener

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: was a little comprehensive because ive never spent that much on a headset only buying cheap chat headset but the sound is phenomenal and the feel very sturdy the cord that connects it to the controller is very long so if you ever drop you controller it wont rip it off you head
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: PS4 COMPATIBLE
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. We have a PS4 and in the product description it says these can be paired with a PS4. When they arrived however, the box said “Xbox One”. However, we have them a try and they in fact ARE PS4 compatible. Just wanted to make this clear for anyone else thinking about ordering these. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great audio on xbox one!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as an early fathers day gift. He loves is! He can play his games without disrupting the little ones sleeping, and now he can play without my washer and drying disrupting his games! Only downside is now he wants to play his games more often since it's more enjoyable now. Oh well, worth it! **used on xbox one** **have not tried on any other platform/device**
customer_reviews.author: BethanyT

customer_reviews.title: Headset Cord
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. The headset is awesome but the big issue I am having is the cord that plugs into the headset itself. I am not sure if they sent me a bad cord but I have to keep on moving the cord around so I can actually talk in party chat. Not sure if this is an occurring issue that others are experiencing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfy Headset! One Issue
customer_reviews.text: Astro has came out with really good headset for low budget for $60, the headset is really comfortable and I had them on for 4 hours and I wear glasses as well. There is no discomfort, the audio is really good, stereo surround sound. The reason I’m giving these headsets 3/5 stars is that after 4 days of purchasing them the right earcup went out. I have been unplugging them and plugging them back in and it works for a bit to mask it, then the same issue happens again. I was really hoping for these to work out.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Banuelos

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Its high quality sound. Can be plugged into anything it fits into. I use it for my Ps4, Xbox One, my laptop and rarely my phone. The only thing that would make this better is if it were wireless. I doubt it could connect to as many things though.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to buy some astros, due to the price of the higher end products, i procrastinated. I love these headphones. They are durable yet sound good. I would recommend these to anyone who is looking for gaming headphones
customer_reviews.author: benjamin johnson

customer_reviews.title: Broke in a month
customer_reviews.text: The headset stopped working for my son, right after the return window closed. Is there any sort of warranty on this??
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I have a nice round sized head...if you're a gamer you know what I mean... I've spent hundreds of dollars looking for this affordable headset... glad it was recommended to me... saved my scalp and wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Marlon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this gaming headset for my husband. He gamies on an XBOX, Nintendo Switch & his computer. This seems to work really well for all three. I priced out the XBOX branded headsets an I just couldnt make myself purchase at that price. These come with a mouth piece so he can play and communicate with friends or other players. He really enjoys the gaming ecperience with this headset. We would purchase again & have suggested these to others as well. Great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Murphy

customer_reviews.title: The guys love them
customer_reviews.text: My guys are happy wit the product and I’m happy they got what was needed sound is great everything was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Keke

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Volume wheel has to be in the perfect spot for both ear pieces to work Microphone whines and constantly buzzes Have an easier time hearing where other players are using a cheap 20 dollar Chinese knock off that these astros were supposed to replace Refurbished or used and not fixed properly !!!scam do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: concerned consumer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Got the headphones and it wasnt even the ones pictured and mentions, these i got are si gle colume control on the cord, the ones shown are dual volume(game and voice) mounted on the controller, worthless and waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: thomas barber

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers stated these are not comfortable during long periods of use, I have not found that to be an issue. I have a large head and these fit nice. Decent sound, similar to anything you get in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: They're tight on big heads
customer_reviews.text: A good gaming headset with good build quality, as described but one caution -- they are extremely tight on bigger heads -- if you plan on using them for longer than an hour, I'd look at another option. If you have a normal size head, then these will likely be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: The mic is very clear and it connects easily. Noise cancellation well
customer_reviews.text: Using it with a ps4, sometimes an Xbox one. The mic is very clear and it connects easily. Noise cancellation well.
customer_reviews.author: Kata

customer_reviews.title: AWESOMEEEEEE
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck. Comfortable. Durable. Bigger than I expected (that’s what she said). But all in all, it’s a great set of gaming headphones. You don’t have to color coordinate, like green for Xbox, or blue for PS. If you like blue and have an Xbox, just get blue. Game on, player
customer_reviews.author: Moku

customer_reviews.title: Definite bang for your buck, does not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Yes! This is definitely worth every penny. The sound quality is excellent and it's extremely comfortable. I bought an off brand and regretted it immediately upon opening the package and with this one I know that what I payed for is quality and quality is what was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: David Z. Heben

customer_reviews.title: The mic started having issues
customer_reviews.text: The sound is pretty good and its overall a really good head set i purchased this around 5 months ago and i just started having a issue with the mic where it sounded like a robot and i take really good care of my stuff so i dont really know what the issue is but sometimes it works perfectly but at times i have that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level headset for your young ones.
customer_reviews.text: I've got a big head so these aren't the best for me, but I bought a pair for each of my boys and they're great. I'd recommend these or the HyperX cloud stinger for first time buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Levi G

customer_reviews.title: No audio mixer included
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because I thought the amp was a part of the product (exactly how it’s shown in the photo) but the amp is not included. Instead, it’s a regular auxiliary connection. Aside from not being the same as shown in the photos, they are quite heavy and bulky. Plan on returning!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Bar

customer_reviews.title: Looked used and not in good shape for "new" item
customer_reviews.text: Product showed up in zero packaging with zero labels. It was thrown in a box and looked used, despite the description saying new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not shabby at all
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and comfortable. For the price point, you probably cannot find a better deal. The audio output is not that of a polk headset, but they do a good job when streaming and gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves the A10 Gaming Headset. Just what he wanted for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Willis

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortabe
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable and easy to use, just make sure to connect it carefully. the audio is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Eli Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the headset I had to trouble getting both the ear pieces to work because you have to shove the gray piece into the headset really hard and the black one goes into the controller. I almost returned these because I was losing patient trying to get them to work but eventually i got them to work. The sound quality is pretty good. I use them for xbox one. So far so good. Hopefully they will last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Brazie

customer_reviews.title: My husband just told me he loved them! Great sound
customer_reviews.text: My husband just told me he loved them! Great sound, the feeling is comfortable and its not too tight. I also heard his roommate while he was talking to me lol so needless to say the mic is pretty decent too!
customer_reviews.author: meg andrews

customer_reviews.title: these are perfect. I use them ob my cbox one for ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a mid-level gaming headset, these are perfect. I use them ob my cbox one for shooter games and I can hear everything. I hear people coming from behind or up stairs. They are a great headset for the price and the mic is crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Blanchette

customer_reviews.title: These work great. I wasn’t sure at first how good they ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I wasn’t sure at first how good they would work. But high priced stuff isn’t always the best. And that’s the case with these head phones. They are phenomenal and recommend buying a set
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: They sent me Defective headphones
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage. Ordered it, got it, didn’t even work. Only one side works at a time. If the jack is plugged in all the way the left side only works, if I pull it out a little bit only the right side works. Spent too much money expediting shipping just to get a worthless product. The plus side is they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to my grandson who loves them for gaming! Great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Not so great!
customer_reviews.text: These came broke. I bought these way in advance of Christmas so the return window closed and my son opened these only to find they don’t work. Now I have no way of fixing this except spending another $100 plus dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Darth_tater69

customer_reviews.title: Good mic noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.text: The headset works good. Good sound, mic quality with noise canceling is great. I have a 13000 btu ac I sit next to and the guys i play Xbox with could always hear it and with these they cannot. I would deff reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headset!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this headset is better than the Xbox or PS4 headset. I have owned all 3 and this one is built to last much longer. I am impressed with this headset. I use them on my PC, PS4, and Xbox.
customer_reviews.author: G. Blankenbaker

customer_reviews.title: Good mic
customer_reviews.text: So far all I’ve gotten from my friends is “yo your mic is so clear” the sound seems good hard for me to judge coming from tv audio to headset, doesn’t seem to be too great in pinpointing footsteps. Heavier than expected but good quality. Only reason 4 stars is idk what a 5 star pair of headphones are, and they got $5 cheaper since i bought them 3 days ago..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones for cheap price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Same day delivery and I couldn't be happier with my headphones. Clear sound on both ends. Very comfortable and I love the mute mic function. Splendid!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headset for the price and extremely durable. Im the type of person to just throw things when I lose like a game of fortnite but these definitely withstand that cause of its durability also no echoing and friends on xbox say that the sound is crisp and perfect and even thought they were like 150$
customer_reviews.author: techmo

customer_reviews.title: Mic didn't work straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I only give this 2 stars because they are comfortable to wear and listening to music is good, but the mic never worked, straight out of the box. Super unhappy about that! Buyer beware. May be fine, may be useless as gaming headset.
customer_reviews.author: apb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!!! Our son loves his and uses it everyday! Best purchase I made for Christmas. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great product just remember to buy the adapter
customer_reviews.text: This headset works great after we had to find the old adapter which we tossed in the dumpster. Which is my only complaint it did not come with an adapter to fit on the controller.
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Four stars due to poor connection on the aux cord. You have to fiddle with it to keep a good connection.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out of the box...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these headsets to go along with new Xbox 360 for Christmas. One headset never worked straight out of the box while the second stopped working after one day. Hard to explain the great reviews of this product—perhaps it was just a coincidence that we received two non-working headsets?? Unfortunately these are going back and will try a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Shalu Jaisinghani

customer_reviews.title: Best headset for price
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t my first headset I’ve had turtle beach’s all the way too Japan styled headsets but by far Astro’s are the best. Astros can be expensive but these are cheap and affordable and include the speakers from the Astro A40’s and they’re super comfy except for the fact that the padding on that supports the head it’s fine for about 3 hours then it starts to bug me but that probably because I have a big head.
customer_reviews.author: Teagan EchoHawk

customer_reviews.title: Headphones give off feedback at high volume.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are terrible. You cant even listen to the volume on max output on xbox and be in a party with your friends because the microphone picks up the stereo speaker volume from the earmuffs that go over your ears. Dont buy this cr*p.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER 1 DAY
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son's birthday. He had them for 1 day and on the second day they completely stopped working. For no reason at all. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY OR TIME. Paid $59, now they sell for $39 days later?! Because they're garbage. Totally frustrated and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: nikki maddox

customer_reviews.title: You'll love em
customer_reviews.text: Works great and very comfortable. My one critic would be you cant switch sides with the mic.
customer_reviews.author: Da Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I got this within 4 days of ordering... and I gotta say, it was worth it. When I opened it from the amazon shipping box, I was almost disappointed because I have a PS4, but came to find out, all it has is an audio jack, which is just as compatible to the PS4. IF YOU HAVE A PS4 DONT WORRY, THE GREEN ONE ALSO WORKS FOR IT. I'm more than happy with the sound and mic quality. And its comfortable. Extremely. If you're looking for a good headset for a good price, this one is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Defective headset.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today and only left speaker works. Returning Asap. Save yourself the time and order from somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: She loves them
customer_reviews.text: My youngest daughter is a gamer now and I have a pair of the A50's for the x1and love them so I saw a cheaper version and hit a home run she loves them
customer_reviews.author: BIG T.

customer_reviews.title: Defective product, no postage paid returns
customer_reviews.text: Bought this headphone for my grandson. Right speaker didn't work at all. Returned defective product and had to pay for the postage to return it. You would think that if they stood behind their products, the least they would do is to provide postage paid returns. Will not order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: GLH

customer_reviews.title: Great sound -great price
customer_reviews.text: My son rec this headset for Christmas. He loves it. Great sound -great price.
customer_reviews.author: DWhit

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Headset !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother and he is now apart of the Astro gaming industry! ofcourse i have the A40 Mixamp pro, but any astro headset you will be extremely satisfied. Although it's in the name itself, ASTRO! an outer space experience!
customer_reviews.author: Stelle & Donald W.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product - As described
customer_reviews.text: 6 months later and he is still using this daily !
customer_reviews.author: Christine Bostrom

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mouthpiece fell off and Astro customer service sucks. They put you through the ringer just for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: They don't really provide a good seal around the ears
customer_reviews.text: They don't really provide a good seal around the ears, the Turtle Beach XO Fours provide a much better seal.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

product_meta.title: ASTRO Gaming A10 Gaming Headset - Green/Black - Xbox One
product_meta.description:
Platform For Display:Xbox One| Edition:Black Headset

Made to out-last your game, the A10 Headset features durable construction and extended comfort so you can play longer with no down-time. A 3.5mm jack provides compatibility with nearly any device, including your mobile phone or tablet. The A10 Headset is tuned for gaming with ASTRO Audio, ensuring you hear your game and your teammates with clarity and precision. With the omnidirectional mic featuring flip-up mute functionality and in-line Volume Control, you'll have total command of your gaming audio experience. Frequency response 20 to 20,000 Hz, Microphone 6.0mm unidirectional microphone.

Technical Specification:

 * Power Output: 0.973 Vrms @ 1kHz
 * Audio Fidelity: 48kHz 16-bit per channel Stereo
 * Mic Fidelity: 24kHz 16-bit Mono
 * Amplifier Output: 0.973 Vrms @ 1kHz
 * Amplifier Distortion: 0.014% THD @ 1kHz
feature_bullets: Durability: The A10 Headset features durable headband anodized aluminum wrapped in a damage resistant polycarbonate blend so your headset will withstand wins, losses, and everything in between
Comfort: Extended comfort memory foam ear-cushions keep you from fatigue so you can play as long as you want in complete comfort
Communication: With the omnidirectional mic featuring flip-up mute functionality and in-line Volume Control, you and your teammates will always hear each other clearly and accurately
Sound Quality: Tuned for Gaming, the A10 features immersive and accurate audio the way sound developers intended. Low latency and precise voice communication mean you're always in sync
Compatibility: Xbox One, PS4, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, MAC, and PC
All current ASTRO Gaming products designed for Xbox One will offer continuous compatibility on Xbox: Series X.
